replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Dreamed_Wu
replies.txt_content: 您好，最新的Traincraft的确只更新到1.6.4，不过可以尝试一下Rails of War这个mod,本站也有人转载，地址为：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ht=rails%2Bof%2Bwar

replies.txt_content:
